page.title: 12The Supernatural in Bognor
page.content: {A local ghost story.} On the 8th. of April 1985 Mr. Graham Bell sighted a ghostly woman, three dogs and a young baby in Hotham Park by the pond shortly before midnight. After 15 seconds they disappeared. The ghosts came through the trees and bushes. The woman seemed to be wearing 18th Century costume. There was no one else in the park at the time and Mr. Bell had not been drinking! This is not thge first sighting of ghosts in Hotham Park. It is possible that the ghosts were the previous inhabitants of {Hotham Park House} which was built in 1792.
